column4: hey guys I am looking for some software to burn MP3 cds i already have brasareo and K3B but I cant creat an MP3 with them it will only let me create a regular cd does anyone know what else I can use
hey guys I am looking for some software to burn MP3 cds i already have brasareo and K3B but I cant creat an MP3 with them it will only let me create a regular cd does anyone know what else I can use
an mp3 cd is nothing more than a data CD, you can use any cd rcording software set to burn data, not audio,. drag your mp3's, burn and play
